item.description:
If you would like to attend, please email stories@massmouth.com and further directions will be sent to you.

 

This is an extra workshop organized by a massmouth member with Nicolette Nordin Heavey and Andrea Lovett as facilitators.  There are only a couple of spots left.   The charge is $30.00 for the 2 hr. workshop.

  • Have you ever wanted to get up and tell a story from your life but unsure how to get started?
  • Do you want to improve your ability to engage an audience and impact them?
  • Do you have some life experience and wisdom to share with others, and you would like a place to learn how to do that as well as a platform to practice it?

If you answered "yes" to any of these questions, you're going to love this meetup.  Norah Dooley and Andrea Lovett, the founders of massmouth, the largest storytelling organization in Boston, will lead a special "in -home" workshop.  In this fun, interactive event, you'll stretch yourself as you learn how to craft a kickbutt 5 minute personal story from scratch.

It's a lot easier andfaster than you think, especially when you have an easy-to-follow formula for story creation.  Believe it or not, you will have you story completely done in a matter of minutes. 

You'll get to practice several variations of your story throughout the class with a partner, and, at the end, you'll be able to share your story with the group.

Plus, in order to help you imporve as fast as possible,you will be recorded with a high-quality camera and mic so it can be reviewed at home.  Or post the video on YouTube, facebook, discussion forums, or put it on a DVD and send it to family and friends.   It's a great way to share your story with others and helps other get to know you.  Plus, you can show the story to more experienced speakers and storytellers and get some extremely valuable feedback, if you want.

Regardless of whether you do anything with your video, this proves to be a fun and engaging event that will transform you into a much better speaker and storyteller in just 2 short hours.  You will walk away with a video AND more confidence and skill in front of an audience; and that will stay with you for the rest of your life.
